channel.title: [317] Update a Web Client Cache? [317]
channel.description: Okay, so I've made a Web Client for my server now (Thanks to Halflingblade's tutorial) and I was wondering if there is a way to make the client "check" for a cache update and download it automatically? I mean, right now if you want the client to download the latest cache you will have to manually delete the cache store before it will download it, but is there a way to make it download the latest cache automatically?

item.title: [317] Update a Web Client Cache? [317]
item.dc:creator: @artego artego
item.description:
@artego wrote:

I really don’t know I need the same please help me!

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Update a Web Client Cache? [317]
item.dc:creator: @Praktikanten Praktikanten
item.description:
@Praktikanten wrote:

Okay, so I’ve made a Web Client for my server now (Thanks to Halflingblade’s tutorial) and I was wondering if there is a way to make the client “check” for a cache update and download it automatically? I mean, right now if you want the client to download the latest cache you will have to manually delete the cache store before it will download it, but is there a way to make it download the latest cache automatically?

Read full topic
